title: Biden Administration to Work With Drugmakers to Boost Covid-19 Vaccine Supply
sub_head: The plan is to spend billions of dollars with a goal of producing an additional one billion doses a year
body:
WASHINGTON—The U.S. government plans to spend billions of dollars to join with drugmakers on increasing Covid-19 vaccine supply with a goal of producing an additional one billion doses a year, the Biden administration said Wednesday.
“The goal is to guarantee manufacturing capacity for Covid as well as for future pandemic viruses,” said David Kessler, chief science officer at the Department of Health and Human Services. “We are looking for a historic agreement that guarantees mRNA capacity.”
